'''Fragrant Noodles with Mountain Delicacies''' is an Event Item obtained during the [[Spices From the West]] Event.

It can be created by adding [[Fragrant Seasoning]] to Delicious [[Noodles with Mountain Delicacies]] in the event menu.

==Character Taste-Test Responses==
[[Characters]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]] respond with different [[Spices From the West/Voice-Overs|voice-overs]] depending on their personal preferences.
